bibl.title: The Cambridge Companion to Ancient Greek Law.
bibl.note: 22 contributions. - Pp. xiii: M.G., Preface; - 1-26: D.C., Introduction; - 431-456: Bibliography; - 457-474: Index Locorum (see p. 474: Papyrological Sources); - 475-480: General Index.
bibl.seg: GAGARIN Michael and David COHEN (Edd.), The Cambridge Companion to Ancient Greek Law.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2005, 8°, xiv-480 pp. ISBN 0-521-81840-0 (hbk) / 0-521-52159-9 (pbk). £45 (hbk) / 18.99 (pbk).
